plot: An Iranian jeweler who helped arrest a thief discovers that the culprit has been released from prison and is out for revenge.
title: Karat 14
plot_es: An Iranian jeweler who helped arrest a thief discovers that the culprit has been released from prison and is out for revenge.
plot_en: An Iranian jeweler who helped arrest a thief discovers that the culprit has been released from prison and is out for revenge.
